      • clearAllBlocs

        public boolean clearAllBlocs()
        Méthode pour supprimer tous nos blocs
        Returns:
        true si tout s'est bien passé, false sinon

      • calculateHash

        public java.lang.String calculateHash(Bloc bloc)
        Méthode qui retourne le hash d'un bloc par son id
        Parameters:
        bloc - bloc concerné
        Returns:
        la hash générée, null en cas d'erreur

      • mineBloc

        public boolean mineBloc(int idBloc,
                        int difficulty)
        Method that allows us to mine block by resolving the proof of work for current block with a set difficulty. Mining will continue as long as calculated hash is different from expected hash. When Proof of work is resolved, the block is mined.
        Parameters:
        idBloc - bloc's id
        difficulty - number of 0s at the beginning of the hash for the current block
        Returns:
        true if and only if the operation succeeded

      • maxId

        public int maxId()
        Returns:
        l'identifiant maximal des blocs

      • store

        public void store(Bloc b)
